clause_text: The narrator recounts living in a small apartment and starting a job as a graphic designer at the age of twenty-one.
The narrator recounts living alone and starting a new job while their recovering father was cared for by a neighbor during the day.
The narrator recounts a personal story of feeling compelled to pray for their father's recovery at a park during a work break.
